name: Flip-Flop

inputs.name: Enter
inputs.description: The input execution that triggers this node

outputs.name: A
outputs.description: Execute the next node when "Is A" is true

outputs.name: B
outputs.description: Execute the next node when "Is A" is false

outputs.name: Is A
outputs.description: The condition flipping every time this node is triggered

description: Switch between two execution outputs. When this node is triggered for the first time, output A is executed. When it is triggered for the second time, output B is executed. For the third time, output A, and so on.
